name: Hunted (DynamicDonut)
description:
Brian Morgan. Vincent Jones. Two detectives, forced to work together to catch an on-going murderer - named the "Widow Maker" - before the streets run rampant with the blood of innocent lives. If they can't get past their differences, there's no hope for this city...

HOW TO PLAY:
This is a two player co-op text adventure game! Each player looks at the screen only when the color of their chosen character is in the background.

( EX: If Player 1 moves to a scene that has a BLUE background, they notify Player 2, close their eyes, and Player 2 takes control of the game.)

Your main goal as a team is to stop any and all crimes you come across, but ultimately solve the mystery of the "Widow Maker"'s identity and take them into custody.

CREDITS:
Code: Bryce Williams
Story: Danielle Verosky
Art, Character Design: Nia Niarra Finelle Cortezano
